personal.name: Venkata Naveen Busiraju
personal.title: Gen AI Developer | Full-Stack Engineer | Cloud Solutions Architect

about.profile: Dynamic and results-driven Gen AI Developer with proven full-stack expertise (Java, Spring Boot, Node.js, Angular, Python) and a passion for leveraging cutting-edge technologies to drive business success. Adept at mapping business requirements to state-of-the-art (SOTA) AI solutions, including generative AI and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG). Skilled in cloud-native development (GCP, AWS), automation, and modernizing legacy systems, consistently optimizing performance across monolithic and microservices architectures. Excels at leading teams through large-scale transformations, ensuring scalability, and delivering measurable impact through innovative AI-driven applications.

highlights.title: Gen AI & ML
highlights.description: LangChain, LangGraph, RAG systems, Azure OpenAI, Multi-agent workflows

highlights.title: Full-Stack
highlights.description: Java Spring Boot, Node.js, Angular, Python microservices architecture

highlights.title: Cloud & DevOps
highlights.description: GCP Certified, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD automation

items: Engineered an enterprise-grade Long-context RAG (LRA) system with Azure OpenAI GPT-4, LangChain, and LangGraph to analyze learning course materials (PDF, DOCX, PPTX, XLSX) against a Data Quality Checklist (DQC). Automated compliance reporting via SharePoint, cutting review time by 65%.

Orchestrated a multi-agent workflow via LangGraph + MCP with dedicated agents for retrieval, checklist validation, review synthesis, and orchestration, ensuring schema enforcement and fault tolerance.
Developed an Account Receivable Email Agent that classified, extracted, and validated invoice data from emails and attachments, reducing AR resolution time by 55%.
Built an invoice-understanding pipeline combining OCR (pdfplumber, pytesseract) + Llama-3 prompting + agent validation, achieving 96% field-level accuracy and generating ERP-ready JSON.
Experimented with LLM fine-tuning (LoRA/QLoRA) using Hugging Face Transformers to adapt models for domain-specific document Q&A.
Implemented hyperparameter tuning and algorithm experiments to optimize model accuracy while maintaining computational efficiency.
Drove CI/CD efforts with Docker, Kubernetes, and GitHub Actions to automate testing and deploy ML models on GCP and AWS.
Migrated parts of the legacy architecture to Angular and Node.js, ensuring a robust and scalable system design.
Integrated Java Spring Boot with GCP for the Decarbonization Project, focusing on high performance and reliability.
Led continuous integration efforts, implementing GitHub Actions, Docker, and Kubernetes across both GCP, ensuring efficient and reliable software delivery.
Migrated legacy projects to Angular and Node.js, enhancing performance and workflow efficiency by integrating cutting-edge GCP services.
Deployed and managed Dockerized microservices on GCP, ensuring uniformity between development and production environments and minimizing deployment risks.
Configured and optimized cloud infrastructure on GCP to bolster application performance and enhance security measures.
Contributed to the Decarbonization Project by developing and integrating Java Spring Boot solutions across GCP, driving project success and sustainability initiatives.

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree - Computer Science and Engineering
